rulePubDate:
<js>
try {
	p = java.getString('a@href')
	ml = `https://ghproxy.net/https://raw.githubusercontent.com${p}`
	url = ml.replace(/blob/, 'refs/heads')
	let response = java.ajax(url)
	let data = JSON.parse(response)
	pi = (data[0].bookSourceComment).replace(/\/\/(.*)\n.*\n.*/,'$1');	po=data[0].bookSourceUrl
	result=`${pi}🔖${po}`
} catch (e) {
	result = ""
}
result
</js>
ruleTitle:
<js>
try {
	p = java.getString('a@href')
	ml = `https://ghproxy.net/https://raw.githubusercontent.com${p}`
	url = ml.replace(/blob/, 'refs/heads')
	let response = java.ajax(url)
	let data = JSON.parse(response)
	result = data[0].bookSourceName
	} catch (e) {
	result = ""
}
result
</js>
